name: Win The Game
description:
You wake up on a remote island with a weapon and a message to "win the game." Fight for your life against your fellow students in this murder game inspired by Battle Royale & The Hunger Games

> story

As the character Shinobu, put yourself into your very own Battle Royale-inspired murder game. You will start the game with some food rations and a random weapon. You can get anything from a shoe to a flame thrower. Try to kill everybody within the set time limit, or find if there's another way off the island.

> features

  • Battle System
  • Inventory System
  • Health & Sanity Meters
  • Map & Free Movement
  • Automatic Forbidden Zones
  • Ammo System (Optional)
  • Follower System
  • Highly Customizable

> details

  • Open Source
  • 25,000 Words
  • 800x600 Resolution
  • 3 Endings
  • 2 Neutral Endings
  • 1 Good Ending
  • Ages 13+ Only
